eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm

Class JMSConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm.JMSConnection

  • public class JMSConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable class that wraps the various objects of a JMS based connection: the context, connection, session, queue, etc.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.10.05.

        Initialize the connection with the supplied JMS objects.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the JNDI context
        conn - the queue connection
        session - the session
        queue - the target queue
